issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: - If we deploy the "activemq-rar-5.9..rar" (or higher to that release) on EAP6.3 and then define the resource adapter properties "InitialRedeliveryDelay" and "MaximumRedeliveries" together, then it is noticed that the InitialRedeliveryDelay is always set to 1 second.
fields.summary: activemq-rar-5.9.0.rar does not respect InitialRedeliveryDelay when MaximumRedeliveries is defined.
